title: CATculator
fullDescription: CATculator is a playful command-line tool that lets you convert your cat's age into its human equivalent. It prompts for your catâ€™s name and age, uses a standard formula to calculate human years, and then classifies your feline as a kitten, adult, or senior. Great for cat lovers and curious coders alike!
